_: I wanted to build something unique and interesting without any external libraries

This is a cube.
You can pinch to zoom in and out.
I wanted to show that Flutter is not just for 2D..
This is a Tesseract or Hypercube in double rotation around x and w axis.
So in a nutshell this is 2D canvas that is drawing 3D shadow of a 4D object.
Well.. That's it. Thank you for your time!
